title: Scientific Inquiry Projects Utilizing Social and Ubiquitous Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A blended course combining social learning platforms and mobile technology for science education targeting office/administrative professionals, emphasizing field-immersive inquiry activities using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can use social collaboration tools to develop scientific inquiry project plans
Learners can derive scientific conclusions from data collected in ubiquitous environments (smart devices/sensors)
Learners can improve project outcomes through peer assessment and feedback in blended environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
